decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( P-214 B WR-01 Received: 30 September 2016, P-214 B WR-02 Rev A (Existing) Received: 15 November 2016
P-214 B WR-02 Rev C (Proposed) Received: 2 January 2016 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The window formed in the side facing roofslope shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of side and rear roof extensions to first floor flat with roof window to front elevation
